markings:
each page showing the scene of special products being made;

Woodcutters(Soma-bito)
Timber Handlers(Zaimoku nagashi no zu)
Making Dried Gourd Shavings at Kizu in Sesshu_ Province(Sesshu_ Kizu no kanpyo_)
Picking Tea Leves at Uji(Uji cha-tsumi)
Making Tea Leaves(Cha koshirae)
List of Famous Tea(Cha meibutsu taigai)
Making Roasted Tea(Bairo)
Tangerines of Kii Province(Kii no kuni mikan)

title: Famous Products from Mountain and Sea vol. 2
